• Dribbble Short Urls

    The dribbble short url is now copied to the clipboard. Clicking on the Growl notification still links to the full url.

  • Update Preferences

    Update preferences have been added to the Preference Window.

  • Copy Link to Clipboard

    A preference to control if the link will be copied to the clipboard has been added in the General tab.

  • Bug Fix: Growl

    The preference to show Growl notifications now works and has been renamed to be more clear.
